constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 99 (Thursday, June 9, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GARAMENDI:
H.R. 8007.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clauses 1, 14, and 18 of the U.S.
Constitution
[Page H5447]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Stop Price Gouging the Military Act
